instructions: On an iOS device navigate to your profile tab . Tap the three horizontal lines in the upper right corner. Tap the gear icon at the bottom to access your settings . If you're using an Android device, you may need to tap the three-line menu icon in the top right corner of the screen then select the Settings gear icon and then scroll down and select Original Posts . Tap Account , then Original Photos. Toggle Save Original Photos to turn it on so that it appears blue.
